nodes.bodyText: This should only run if the service wasn't replaced, this will throw a class cast exception otherwise.

Any reason that this is split into ValueParser and ValueCompleter? In general, they should just be one ValueParameter if this is the case (the docs say if a ValueParameter is passed it will use the completer there).
All static calls must be qualified - no static imports for this.

@Zidane likes final things.
(When possible, variables and classes should be final)
Static acesses from the same class should also be qualified with the class name.

nodes.bodyText:
More of a note for the future - but storing an optional just feels wrong. It's being used to avoid optional (re)creation in getters, but... how often are the getters called? Not often I'm sure! The sendTo method actually unwraps the optional into a null.
Perhaps this is a good time to ditch the optionals and just have nullable fields.
.first(Audience.class) -> .getAudience() (audiences do have special handling in command causes)

commit.message:
Make common.service.pagination compile

Also use namespaced commands to avoid ambiguity with mods/plugins commands

Couple of fixes

Make sure we compile with UTF-8 or it breaks special characters used in the pagination list
Attempt to work around a Style#getBold stackoverflow
Fix footer padding being 1 characters too long (not a fan of decrementing but I found no better way)
Fix padding color always using title's color
Remove unused methods and parameters

Address feedback

- merge ActivePaginationParser & Completer
- remove static imports except for Preconditions
- fix possible CCE when registering pagination command
Replace anonymous guava Function with method reference

Address feedback - pass 2

- stop copying Styles in PaginationCalculator to avoid StackOverflows,
 fixed in 44be61c0dbc79069f82c174b63d7a68aa254c1b7 thanks dual !
- replace Optional fields by nullable ones
- remove outdated comment
- use CommandCause#getAudience instead of Cause#first

Also fix a possible NPE in ActivePaginationParameter#complete
